뉴스제목: Ledger Users Targeted in New Phishing Scam
본문: Ledger users have become the latest targets of a sophisticated phishing scam, as scammers impersonate official Ledger communications to steal recovery phrases. These fake emails, crafted to appear legitimate, urge users to verify their recovery phrases on a fraudulent website, granting attackers full access to victims’ cryptocurrency wallets. The surge in holiday transactions adds urgency to the ongoing threat of crypto scams. The phishing campaign, detailed by tech news outlet Bleeping Computer, begins with deceptive emails titled “Security Alert: Data Breach May Expose Your Recovery Phrase.” These emails claim that a recent Ledger data breach may have put users’ recovery phrases at risk and direct recipients to a fake Ledger-branded website. Hosted on Amazon Web Services, the site appears professional and mimics Ledger’s legitimate platform. Users are prompted to conduct a "security check" by entering their recovery phrases, which are then validated against a recognized word list. Regardless of input, the site falsely claims phrases are invalid, encouraging users to try again, ensuring scammers obtain accurate information. Once attackers have the recovery phrases, they can take full control of wallets, draining funds and seizing other digital assets. This scam highlights the dangers of phishing during the holiday season, a time when online activity spikes, and vigilance is often lowered. Ledger has not confirmed a new data breach but reminded users of its long-standing policy: “Ledger will never ask for your 24-word recovery phrase. If someone does, it’s a scam.” The company has faced phishing issues before, especially after a 2020 breach that exposed customer information, leading to targeted phishing campaigns. Another incident in December 2023 saw Ledger’s connector library exploited, resulting in nearly $500,000 in losses. These recurring events have eroded trust among some users, with one remarking, “For a company we trust to safeguard our assets, this is not reassuring.” Crypto fraud has fluctuated recently, with phishing-related losses dropping by 53% in November 2024 to $9.3 million. However, this latest attack suggests scammers are refining their tactics. Security experts warn that crypto investors must remain cautious and take proactive measures to protect their wallets, especially during high-risk periods like the holidays. Ultimately, safeguarding digital assets is the individual’s responsibility.

뉴스제목: Bitcoin Drops Below $104K: Is a $100K Retest Imminent?
본문: Bitcoin price falls below the $104k level and warns of a support trendline breakdown to potentially retest the $100k psychological milestone. After a sudden 2.75% drop over the past 24 hours, Bitcoin has lost its footing above the $104,000 mark. The current BTC price is $103,674, with the market capitalization remaining at $2.052 trillion.As the surge in supply suggests a potential extended correction, attention is now focused on a crucial support trendline. Will the declining trend lead to a breakdown that tests the $100,000 level?Bitcoin Price AnalysisIn the 4-hour chart, Bitcoin’s price action shows a failed attempt to maintain a strong close above the 50% Fibonacci level. The key Fibonacci resistance is at $106,912.Despite reaching a new all-time high of $108,364, overwhelming supply in this region caused a swift bearish reversal. This has led to a 4.42% pullback from the new all-time high. Bitcoin Price Chart The bearish retracement has caused the price to fall below the 20-EMA line on the 4-hour chart. After forming two large bearish engulfing candles, Bitcoin is now testing a critical local support trendline.This support trendline sits slightly above the 38.20% Fibonacci level at $103,093. Additional support is found near the 50-EMA line, around $102,676.Given these support levels, BTC may experience a bullish recovery. However, the quick decline has caused the 4-hour RSI to drop below the halfway mark, signaling increased selling pressure and the potential for further downside.Bitcoin ETFs Buy The DipAmid the overnight correction, BlackRock accumulated $741.41 million worth of Bitcoin yesterday. With this substantial inflow, the total daily net inflow for U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs reached $493.95 million.This contrasts with an outflow of $128.17 million from Fidelity and three other ETFs. Furthermore, over the past 14 days, Bitcoin spot ETFs have seen positive inflows totaling $6.45 billion.BTC Price TargetsAccording to Fibonacci levels, a breakdown below the 38.20% Fibonacci level could lead to a retest of the $100,000 psychological mark, with the 23.60% Fibonacci level at $98,369 serving as a target in the event of an extended decline.Conversely, a bullish reversal for Bitcoin would face resistance at the 50% Fibonacci level, with a bullish target set at $110,730.

뉴스제목: Dogecoin Sentiment Turns Sour as Traders Grow Impatient
본문: The Dogecoin weighted sentiment metric has collapsed in the past few weeks as its sluggish price action triggers impatience among investors. Donald Trump's election victory in November 2024 sparked a wave of excitement that sent the broad crypto market soaring as the president-elect had shown extreme support for the industry during his campaign. However, as the rally now stalls for some assets, investor sentiment may now be changing. This appears particularly true for meme coin market leader Dogecoin (DOGE) .Dogecoin (DOGE) Investors Grow Impatient Following Trump's election victory and the announcement of plans to launch a department of government efficiency playfully nicknamed D.O.G.E. by Tesla CEO Elon Musk, Dogecoin (DOGE) soared about 220% from $0.15139 to highs of $0.48434.But as the rally has stalled over the past few weeks, with DOGE shedding some of its gains to trade at the $0.38429 price point at the time of writing, traders may now be losing patience and faith that the asset's price still has more room for growth in the short term.According to Santiment Feed data shared by prominent crypto analyst Ali Martinez on Tuesday, December 17, weighted DOGE sentiment has turned negative, dropping from highs of nearly five on Santiment' s scale in mid-November to a negative 0.6. Along with this decline in sentiment has also come a massive dip in mentions on social media from over 3,200 to below 300. Santiment Feed chart showing Dogecoin social volume and weighted sentiment. Source: Ali Martinez Santiment Feed chart showing Dogecoin social volume and weighted sentiment. Source: Ali Martinez Still, negative sentiment may not be a reason for investors to panic, as it can often be a contrarian indicator when it is overwhelming. Indeed, analysts continue to sound bullish on the asset despite the recent correction.More Room for Growth Still?Most recently, market analyst Javon Marks has asserted that DOGE has nearly perfectly replicated its historical performance, indicating higher prices. "History says Dogecoin is about to record a near +75% gain and more, to and above its current ATH's ($0.73905) before much, much higher," the analyst wrote.Specifically, the analyst set a conservative final target of $3 and over $15 in the best-case scenario. On a more ambitious note, crypto analyst "Cantonese Cat" has set a target of $24 , citing historical price action.

뉴스제목: Bitcoin Price Prediction: Parabolic Bull Run Incoming—$110K First Stop?
본문: The post Bitcoin Price Prediction: Parabolic Bull Run Incoming—$110K First Stop? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Bitcoin (BTC) price has continued to grind higher in the recent past, but the rising momentum has gradually faded as more altcoins signal an imminent breakout ahead. With the heavy liquidation of long traders, amounting to over $333 million in the past 24 hours, the flagship coin is likely to continue consolidating to pave the way for more bullish sentiment ahead. With 2024 remaining less than two weeks to come to an end, more whale investors have been betting on more uptrends. Moreover, Bitcoin’s open internet (OI) has continued to rise exponentially to a new all-time high of above $68 billion. High Impact News Ahead Bitcoin will lead the altcoin industry in heightened volatility in the coming g three days as central banks from three major economies prepare to release their benchmark interest rates. Later today, the Federal Reserve will release its final FOMC data for 2024 , with analysts forecasting a 25 basis point cut to 4.50 percent amid the cooling down of inflation. On Thursday, the Bank of Japan (BoJ) will review its monetary policies including its benchmark interest rate, with analysts predicting a hold at 0.25 percent. Later on Thursday, the Bank of England (BoE) will release its lending rate, with experts forecasting a hold at 4.75 percent. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Crypto Market Live: Markets Consolidating as BTC, ETH & Others Plunge Hard While PENGU & BGB Prices Surge , What Next? 뉴스제목: US DOJ to call Perplexity executive to testify against Google in the antitrust case
본문: Following Google’s appeal regarding the antitrust case, the Department of Justice (DOJ) seeks to summon particular witnesses. Dmitry Shevelenko, the chief business officer of Perplexity, has been called upon to testify against Google, a direct competitor in the tech arena. According to reports , Dmitry Shevelenko is to be interviewed by the DOJ regarding the relationship between generative AI and Search Access Points, distribution, barriers to entry and expansion, and data sharing. DOJ believes the information might strengthen its argument that Google monopolizes the search business and excludes potential competitors and, as a result, deserves more severe penalties. The link between Perplexity and Google Perplexity and other generative AI tools, such as OpenAI’ s ChatGPT Search, have emerged as a potential alternative to internet searches. These tools can provide direct responses to complex inquiries, even when faced with inaccurate or made-up information. Google, however, saw it as a challenge and responded by developing its own AI search tools, including AI Overviews, which display AI-generated responses above search results. Recently, Aravind Srinivas, the CEO of Perplexity AI expressed his desire to form a partnership with news publishers who have accused the Google challenger of stealing their workstream. He attacked Google’s business model of directing consumers to websites while making money from advertisements or sponsored results. Aravind Srinivas stated, “We certainly were very surprised about the lawsuit because we actually wanted a conversation.” This shows that Perplexity has shown interest in going against Google. This must be the reason why DOJ knows they will cooperate. What is the weight of Perplexity’s testimony? In October, Google served a summons on Perplexity to obtain company documents to substantiate its case that it has a viable competitor in the search industry. However, Google lamented in a court filing that it had not received “a single document” from Perplexity as of December 11. The company contends that after two months of waiting, there is “no conceivable justification for further delay.” According to the filling, Perplexity has already consented to fulfill 12 of Google’s 14 document requests. Still, it claims that it is continuing to assess the burden associated with the collection of such a potentially extensive universe of documents. Perplexity further states that it has agreed to submit copies of licensing agreements related to AI training. But Google wants all of Perplexity’s licensing agreements and has urged Google to “meet and confer” on this matter. The antitrust case The antitrust case was started by the DOJ in 2020 and was joined by more than 30 state attorneys general. The case stated that Google has unfair control over the internet search market. It claimed that Google was breaking the law to stop competing search engines like Bing and DuckDuckGo from doing business. Source: Cloudflare Cloudflare report analysis also showed the extent of Google’s monopoly to be 88.5%. In particular, Google made deals with big companies like internet browsers and smartphone makers like Apple and Android to be the default search engine on their products. This pushed rivals out of the market and stopped them from growing. Ted Sfikas, field chief technology officer at Amplitude explained, “Google’s Search market is so dominant and it is inextricably tied to Google Chrome, Google Ad Network, Google Ads Hub, Google Analytics, and Google Tag Manager, they are demonstrating monopoly power when they cause harm to the market.” Source: Cloudflare According to Cloudflare, Chrome led by 65.8%, which is also part of Google. Judge Amit Mehta agreed with the DOJ that Google acted as a monopolist in the internet search space by barring competitors. This created a feedback loop between monopolization and increased ad revenue, which allowed the company to raise digital ad prices and further dominate the market. According to the verdict, Google has an 89.2% share of the general search market, which rises to 94.9% on mobile devices. However, Google announced its intention to appeal the ruling, alleging that it would restrict consumers’ access to their preferred search engine . 뉴스제목: Deutsche Bank's New Tech Bridges Crypto and Finance
본문: Deutsche Bank has unveiled a groundbreaking Layer-2 (L2) blockchain solution to address the compliance challenges of using public blockchains in traditional finance (TradFi). Named Project Dama 2, this initiative is part of the Monetary Authority of Singapore’s (MAS) Project Guardian and involves major financial institutions exploring blockchain technology for asset tokenization. This innovative L2 protocol enhances public blockchains like Ethereum, focusing on cost efficiency, security, and regulatory compliance. By leveraging curated validators that meet strict compliance standards, Deutsche Bank’s solution ensures safer interactions, reducing risks such as inadvertently engaging with sanctioned entities or unverified validators. The protocol also incorporates advanced features like ZKsync technology, which boosts transaction speed and security. One standout feature is the introduction of "super admin rights" for regulators , granting oversight authorities the ability to monitor transactions transparently when necessary. This approach balances blockchain’s benefits, such as scalability and interoperability, with stringent regulatory requirements, offering a more secure and efficient framework for financial institutions. Public blockchains like Ethereum have the potential to revolutionize finance, particularly through asset tokenization. However, traditional financial institutions have hesitated to adopt them due to compliance concerns. Risks include vulnerabilities to unexpected events, like hard forks, which can disrupt digital ledgers. Deutsche Bank's Layer-2 framework addresses these challenges while maintaining a detailed transaction record separate from the underlying Layer-1 blockchain. Project Dama 2, developed with crypto firms Memento Blockchain Pte. and Interop Labs, aims to bridge TradFi and decentralized systems. It offers a tailored approach to compliance while taking advantage of blockchain's scalability and cost-saving potential. According to Boon-Hiong Chan, Deutsche Bank’s Asia-Pacific innovation lead, public blockchains can offer unmatched benefits if compliance risks are effectively managed. By connecting to Ethereum, the solution highlights the possibilities of integrating decentralized technology with traditional financial systems. This development underscores the importance of collaboration in advancing blockchain innovation . The project reflects a strategic move toward combining TradFi's regulatory rigor with the efficiency of decentralized systems. If approved by regulators , Deutsche Bank plans to launch a minimum viable product (MVP) for Dama 2 next year. This pilot could serve as a model for other financial institutions navigating similar challenges, potentially setting new standards for compliance and innovation in the financial sector.

뉴스제목: MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin Bet: Poised to Surpass Starbucks and Nike in Market Value
본문: MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin Bet: Poised to Surpass Starbucks and Nike in Market Value The meteoric rise of Bitcoin (BTC) has propelled MicroStrategy into the spotlight as one of the most significant corporate players in the cryptocurrency space. Holding an impressive 439,000 BTC , MicroStrategy has leveraged the cryptocurrency’s upward momentum to boost its market cap to $99.4 billion , positioning itself to outpace global brands like Starbucks and Nike if Bitcoin continues its bullish trend. In this article, we explore how MicroStrategy’s strategic investment in Bitcoin is reshaping the financial landscape, examine its potential to surpass industry giants, and assess the risks and rewards associated with its bold approach. MicroStrategy and Bitcoin: An Unbreakable Bond MicroStrategy, a business intelligence and software solutions company, took a transformative turn in 2020 when CEO Michael Saylor announced the company’s pivot toward Bitcoin as a primary treasury reserve asset. This decision was rooted in Saylor’s belief in Bitcoin as “digital gold” and a hedge against inflation. Since then, MicroStrategy has accumulated 439,000 BTC , making it the largest corporate holder of Bitcoin globally. The company’s strategy has not only reshaped its financial outlook but also sparked a wave of Bitcoin adoption among institutional investors. The Numbers Behind MicroStrategy’s Success MicroStrategy’s market cap growth is closely tied to Bitcoin’s price movements. The company gains approximately $440 million for every $1,000 increase in Bitcoin’s price , a testament to the outsized impact of its cryptocurrency holdings. Milestone Projections According to Cointelegraph , MicroStrategy could soon surpass major global brands if Bitcoin reaches the following price points: Bitcoin Price Market Cap Brand Comparison $118,810 $105.5 billion Surpasses Starbucks ($105.5B) $140,000 $115 billion Surpasses Nike ($115B) This ambitious projection highlights the potential of MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin-centric strategy, as it capitalizes on the cryptocurrency’s increasing adoption and value. Why MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin Bet Matters MicroStrategy’s decision to double down on Bitcoin has significant implications for both the cryptocurrency market and the corporate world. Pioneering Institutional Adoption By incorporating Bitcoin into its corporate strategy, MicroStrategy has set a precedent for other companies. It has demonstrated that Bitcoin can serve as a legitimate reserve asset and a tool for value preservation in uncertain economic times. Market Leadership in Cryptocurrency Holdings With its massive Bitcoin holdings, MicroStrategy has positioned itself as a leader in the crypto space. Its success has encouraged other corporations, such as Tesla and Square, to explore Bitcoin investments. Strengthened Brand Identity MicroStrategy’s alignment with Bitcoin has boosted its visibility and appeal, especially among cryptocurrency enthusiasts and investors. This association has further solidified its image as an innovative and forward-thinking company. The Debt-Fueled Strategy: A Double-Edged Sword While MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin strategy has delivered substantial gains, it has also attracted scrutiny due to its reliance on debt to fund cryptocurrency purchases. The company currently holds $7 billion in debt , compared to its $47 billion in Bitcoin holdings . Supporters’ Perspective Proponents argue that MicroStrategy’s long-term Bitcoin investment outweighs its debt obligations. As Bitcoin’s value appreciates, the company’s holdings could generate exponential returns, offsetting any financial liabilities. Critics’ Concerns Market Volatility : Bitcoin’s price is highly volatile, and a significant downturn could expose MicroStrategy to substantial financial risks. Debt Repayment : Critics warn that a prolonged bear market could make it challenging for the company to service its debt, especially if its stock price declines. Stock Premium Debate : Some analysts, such as Clifford Asness of AQR Capital, have questioned the sustainability of MicroStrategy’s trading premium, suggesting that new share buyers may be enriching existing shareholders at their own expense. Bitcoin’s Role in MicroStrategy’s Growth Bitcoin has been the driving force behind MicroStrategy’s growth, providing a significant boost to its market cap and stock price. However, the cryptocurrency’s performance also introduces an element of uncertainty. Bullish Momentum Bitcoin’s recent rally has been fueled by growing institutional interest, increased adoption, and macroeconomic factors such as inflation concerns. This upward trajectory has been a boon for MicroStrategy, solidifying its position as a market leader. Potential Downside If Bitcoin experiences a significant price correction, MicroStrategy’s stock could face downward pressure. The company’s financial health is intrinsically linked to Bitcoin’s market performance, making it vulnerable to crypto market fluctuations. MicroStrategy’s Vision for the Future Despite the inherent risks, MicroStrategy remains committed to its Bitcoin strategy. CEO Michael Saylor has consistently expressed confidence in the cryptocurrency’s long-term potential, positioning it as a cornerstone of the company’s financial strategy. Expanding Bitcoin Adoption MicroStrategy’s success has inspired other corporations to explore Bitcoin as a reserve asset, contributing to the cryptocurrency’s growing adoption. This trend underscores Bitcoin’s potential to become a mainstream financial instrument. Pioneering Innovation By integrating Bitcoin into its corporate strategy, MicroStrategy has positioned itself as a pioneer in the intersection of technology and finance. This forward-thinking approach aligns with the company’s mission to drive innovation and create value for its stakeholders. Key Takeaways for Investors MicroStrategy’s bold approach to Bitcoin investment offers valuable insights for investors: Diversification : The company’s strategy highlights the importance of diversification and innovation in portfolio management. Risk Management : Investors should be mindful of the risks associated with market volatility and debt obligations. Long-Term Vision : MicroStrategy’s commitment to Bitcoin underscores the importance of adopting a long-term perspective in investment strategies. Conclusion: A Bold Gamble with Promising Prospects MicroStrategy’s journey with Bitcoin is a testament to the transformative potential of cryptocurrency in the corporate world. While the company’s debt-fueled strategy has drawn criticism, its massive Bitcoin holdings position it for unprecedented growth if the cryptocurrency’s value continues to rise. As MicroStrategy inches closer to surpassing global brands like Starbucks and Nike, its success serves as both an inspiration and a cautionary tale for other corporations. The company’s bold bet on Bitcoin highlights the opportunities and challenges of embracing cryptocurrency in an ever-evolving financial landscape. Whether MicroStrategy’s strategy will yield long-term success or expose it to significant financial risks remains to be seen. For now, the company’s commitment to Bitcoin has solidified its place as a trailblazer in the intersection of technology, finance, and innovation.

뉴스제목: Crypto Fear & Greed Index Drops to 81: Market Still in ‘Extreme Greed’ Zone
본문: Understanding the Crypto Fear & Greed Index The Crypto Fear & Greed Index , a popular tool for gauging investor sentiment in the cryptocurrency market, fell to 81 on December 18, 2024, dropping six points from the previous day. Despite the decline, the market remains firmly in the “Extreme Greed” zone, indicating continued bullish sentiment among traders and investors. This index, provided by Alternative, serves as a thermometer for the emotional state of the crypto market. A score of 0 reflects “Extreme Fear,” while 100 represents “Extreme Greed.” Understanding how this index works and what it signals can help traders and investors make more informed decisions. What Is the Crypto Fear & Greed Index? The Crypto Fear & Greed Index aggregates data from multiple sources to measure market sentiment, assigning a single score between 0 and 100. It provides insights into whether the market is leaning toward fear , signaling potential undervaluation, or greed , indicating overvaluation. Factors Influencing the Index The index considers six key metrics: Volatility (25%) : Examines market fluctuations over time. Market Momentum/Volume (25%) : Assesses trading activity and price movement. Social Media (15%) : Analyzes sentiment from platforms like Twitter and Reddit. Surveys (15%) : Collects opinions from the crypto community. Bitcoin Dominance (10%) : Tracks Bitcoin’s market share relative to altcoins. Google Trends (10%) : Monitors search interest in cryptocurrency-related terms. The Significance of a Score of 81 With the index at 81 , the market is clearly in the “Extreme Greed” zone. Here’s what this means: 1. High Bullish Sentiment Investors and traders are optimistic, driving prices higher across the cryptocurrency market. Such sentiment often corresponds with new entrants into the market and increased trading activity. 2. Risk of Overvaluation “Extreme Greed” can signal a potential market bubble. Overvaluation may lead to sharp corrections, especially if sentiment shifts due to negative news or profit-taking. 3. Momentum for Altcoins During periods of extreme greed, altcoins often see increased attention and price gains as traders seek higher returns beyond Bitcoin. Implications of the Recent Drop The six-point drop in the index could suggest: 1. Cooling Market Sentiment The slight decline may indicate a pause in market euphoria, potentially leading to short-term consolidation or a minor pullback in prices. 2. Healthy Correction A reduction in extreme greed can be seen as a healthy correction, offering a more sustainable path for the market to grow without overheating. 3. External Factors Macro events, regulatory news, or changes in global markets may have contributed to the slight decline in sentiment. How to Use the Crypto Fear & Greed Index for Trading 1. Identifying Market Trends Extreme Fear (0-24): Indicates undervalued conditions, potentially signaling buying opportunities. Fear (25-49): Suggests caution but may still present opportunities for long-term investors. Neutral (50): Balanced market conditions. Greed (51-74): Bullish sentiment with potential for short-term gains. Extreme Greed (75-100): Overvalued market, where caution is advised. 2. Timing Entries and Exits During extreme greed, traders might consider taking profits or setting stop-loss orders to manage risks. During extreme fear, dollar-cost averaging or opening new positions could yield long-term gains. 3. Complementary Indicators Use the index alongside other tools like RSI (Relative Strength Index), MACD (Moving Average Convergence Divergence), and support/resistance levels for a comprehensive strategy. Key Trends in Crypto Sentiment Bitcoin’s Dominance Bitcoin’s performance often sets the tone for the entire market. Currently, its dominance is contributing to the overall “Extreme Greed” sentiment. Altcoin Activity With Bitcoin leading the charge, altcoins like Ethereum, Solana, and Polygon often follow suit, experiencing heightened trading activity. Market Volatility Periods of extreme greed often correlate with increased volatility, creating both opportunities and risks for traders. The Role of Social Media and Google Trends Social Media Influence Crypto discussions on platforms like Twitter and Reddit significantly impact market sentiment. Positive news or celebrity endorsements can drive the index higher, while FUD (fear, uncertainty, doubt) can push it lower. Google Trends Search interest in terms like “buy Bitcoin” or “crypto bull run” offers a glimpse into retail investor behavior. An uptick in search trends often coincides with higher index scores. What’s Next for the Market? 1. Continued Monitoring of the Index Investors should keep an eye on the index to anticipate potential market reversals. A drop below 75 could signal the start of a more cautious phase. 2. Focus on Key Market Drivers Institutional Activity: Moves by large investors can significantly influence sentiment. Regulatory News: Developments in crypto regulations can sway the index in either direction. Macro Trends: Global economic conditions, such as inflation rates and currency stability, also play a role. 3. Opportunities in Altcoins As the market remains in Altcoin Season, traders may find opportunities in undervalued projects or emerging technologies. Conclusion: Navigating Extreme Greed The Crypto Fear & Greed Index at 81 highlights the market’s strong bullish sentiment, but the slight decline suggests a possible moderation in euphoria. For traders and investors, this is a time to exercise caution while capitalizing on market opportunities. By staying informed and using tools like the Crypto Fear & Greed Index alongside other technical and fundamental indicators, you can navigate the ever-changing crypto market with confidence. 뉴스제목: Ohio Proposes Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Bill Amid Growing Crypto Adoption
본문: Ohio Embraces Bitcoin for Strategic Reserves Cryptocurrency continues to gain traction in the United States, and now Ohio is making headlines by introducing a bill to establish a state-owned strategic Bitcoin reserve . Republican Representative Derek Merrin spearheaded this initiative, adding Ohio to the growing list of states considering Bitcoin as part of their financial strategy. This move follows a similar bill introduced in Texas by Representative Giovanni Capriglione, highlighting a broader trend of state governments exploring Bitcoin adoption. What Is a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve? A strategic Bitcoin reserve involves a state or entity holding a portion of its financial assets in Bitcoin. The rationale is to leverage Bitcoin’s potential as a hedge against inflation, diversify reserves, and embrace the technological advancements driving the digital economy. For states like Ohio, creating a Bitcoin reserve signals a commitment to innovation and positions them as leaders in cryptocurrency adoption. Details of Ohio’s Bitcoin Reserve Bill Key Provisions Proposed by: Ohio Republican Representative Derek Merrin. Goal: Establish a state-owned Bitcoin reserve to diversify Ohio’s financial assets. Potential Uses: Hedge against inflation. Support technological innovation within the state. Attract blockchain and crypto-related businesses to Ohio. Timeline and Implementation While specific timelines for the bill’s passage and implementation remain unclear, its introduction marks a significant step toward integrating cryptocurrency into state-level financial strategies. Texas Leads the Way in Bitcoin Reserves The Texas Bill Just days before Ohio’s announcement, Texas Representative Giovanni Capriglione introduced a similar bill. Texas has long been a hub for cryptocurrency mining and innovation, and a Bitcoin reserve could further solidify its status as a crypto-friendly state. Lessons for Ohio Ohio can look to Texas for guidance in implementing a strategic Bitcoin reserve, including: Legal frameworks for procurement and storage. Collaboration with blockchain experts. Educating the public on the benefits and risks of cryptocurrency reserves. Why Are States Considering Bitcoin Reserves? 1. Hedge Against Inflation Bitcoin’s fixed supply of 21 million coins makes it a potential hedge against inflation, unlike fiat currencies, which can be printed in unlimited amounts. 2. Economic Diversification State-owned Bitcoin reserves diversify financial portfolios, reducing reliance on traditional assets like bonds and equities. 3. Encouraging Innovation Adopting Bitcoin can position states as leaders in technological innovation, attracting blockchain startups and investment. 4. Preparing for a Digital Future As cryptocurrencies gain mainstream acceptance, states with Bitcoin reserves will be better equipped to navigate the evolving financial landscape. Challenges in Establishing a Bitcoin Reserve While the concept of a strategic Bitcoin reserve is promising, there are significant challenges: 1. Regulatory Hurdles Cryptocurrency regulation in the U.S. remains complex, with varying rules at the state and federal levels. States like Ohio must navigate these regulations to ensure compliance. 2. Volatility Risks Bitcoin’s price volatility poses a risk to state finances. Effective risk management strategies will be crucial for maintaining financial stability. 3. Public Perception Educating residents about the benefits and risks of a Bitcoin reserve will be essential to gain public support. 4. Security Concerns Ensuring the safety of state-owned Bitcoin reserves will require robust cybersecurity measures to prevent theft and hacking. Economic Implications for Ohio Boosting Blockchain Adoption Creating a Bitcoin reserve could attract blockchain startups and investors, fostering economic growth and job creation in Ohio. Increasing Revenue Streams If Bitcoin’s value continues to rise, Ohio’s Bitcoin reserve could generate significant returns, benefiting the state budget. Enhancing State Reputation By embracing cryptocurrency, Ohio positions itself as a forward-thinking state, encouraging innovation and technological advancement. Global Trends in Bitcoin Reserves Nation-State Adoption Countries like El Salvador have already adopted Bitcoin as legal tender and maintain national Bitcoin reserves. Ohio’s move aligns with this global trend, albeit at the state level. Institutional Adoption Major corporations like MicroStrategy and Tesla have invested heavily in Bitcoin, showcasing its potential as a strategic asset. What’s Next for Ohio? 1. Legislative Process Ohio lawmakers will debate and refine the bill before it can be passed into law. Public hearings and expert consultations are expected. 2. Collaboration with Industry Experts Partnering with blockchain and cryptocurrency experts will be crucial for implementing the reserve effectively. 3. Addressing Public Concerns Ohio must address questions around Bitcoin’s volatility, environmental impact, and long-term viability to gain public trust. Conclusion: A Bold Step Toward the Future Ohio’s introduction of a Bitcoin strategic reserve bill marks a pivotal moment in cryptocurrency adoption at the state level. While challenges remain, the potential benefits—including economic diversification, technological innovation, and financial stability—make this a compelling initiative. As more states follow suit, Bitcoin’s role in public finance could reshape the future of government asset management. For Ohio, this bold step positions the state as a leader in embracing the digital economy. 뉴스제목: A Comprehensive Guide to Forex Trading and Demo Accounts: Best Options for 2024
본문: Forex Trading Accounts Forex trading offers immense opportunities to generate profits by trading currency pairs. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced trader, understanding the various types of Forex trading accounts is essential. One of the best ways to start is by using a Forex demo account, which allows traders to practice strategies risk-free before committing real funds. In this guide, we’ll explore everything you need to know about Forex demo accounts, funded Forex accounts, managed accounts, and how to get started with live trading. What is a Forex Demo Account? A Forex demo account is a simulated trading account provided by brokers, allowing traders to practice Forex trading with virtual funds. These accounts mimic live trading conditions, enabling users to familiarize themselves with the market, test strategies, and understand broker platforms without risking real money. Advantages of Using a Forex Demo Account Risk-Free Learning: Hone your skills and strategies without the fear of financial loss. Familiarization: Get accustomed to a broker’s trading platform and tools. Testing Strategies: Evaluate the effectiveness of your trading techniques in real-market conditions. Transition to Live Trading: Build confidence before moving to a live Forex trading account. How to Open a Forex Trading Demo Account Choose a Reliable Broker: Look for brokers offering free demo accounts with realistic market conditions. Register: Sign up on the broker’s platform by providing basic details like your name and email address. Download the Platform: Most brokers support platforms like MetaTrader 4 (MT4) or MetaTrader 5 (MT5). Start Practicing: Use virtual funds provided by the broker to execute trades and learn Forex trading. Best Forex Demo Accounts in 2024 1. IG Forex Demo Account Key Features: Unlimited virtual funds. Real-time market prices and charts. Access to educational tools. 2. eToro Demo Account Key Features: $100,000 in virtual funds. Social trading features. Easy-to-navigate interface. 3. XM Demo Account Key Features: $100,000 virtual funds. Access to MT4 and MT5. Tight spreads and low commissions. 4. Plus500 Forex Demo Account Key Features: Unlimited demo period. Real-time quotes. Intuitive trading platform. 5. Forex.com Demo Account Key Features: $50,000 virtual funds. Advanced trading tools. Market analysis and insights. Transitioning to Live Forex Accounts 1. Funded Forex Accounts Funded Forex accounts allow traders to trade with capital provided by funding programs. Traders retain a portion of the profits while the funding provider takes the rest. Top Platforms for Funded Accounts: FTMO MyForexFunds The5ers 2. Managed Forex Accounts Managed accounts are perfect for investors who prefer professionals to trade on their behalf. These accounts are overseen by expert Forex traders who execute trades in exchange for a management fee or profit share. Benefits of Managed Accounts: Professional trading expertise. Passive income opportunities. Diversification of portfolio. Forex Trading Platforms: Features to Look For When selecting a Forex trading platform, ensure it includes the following: User-Friendly Interface: Easy navigation for beginners and advanced features for experienced traders. Analytical Tools: Charts, indicators, and market analysis tools. Compatibility: Platforms like MT4 or MT5 for flexibility and customizations. Demo to Live Transition: Seamless shift from demo to live accounts. Free Forex Demo Accounts vs. Paid Accounts Free Demo Accounts: Ideal for beginners. No risk involved. Access to limited features. Paid Accounts: Advanced features like premium market insights. Suitable for seasoned traders. Better customer support. FAQs About Forex Demo and Funded Accounts 1. Is a Forex demo account free? Yes, most brokers offer free Forex demo accounts to traders. 2. How long can I use a Forex demo account? Some brokers offer unlimited access, while others limit usage to 30-90 days. 3. What is a funded Forex account? A funded Forex account provides traders with capital to trade, sharing profits with the funding provider. 4. Are managed Forex accounts profitable? Managed accounts can be profitable if handled by experienced traders. However, fees and risks should be considered. 5. Can I switch from a demo to a live account? Yes, most brokers allow seamless transitions from demo to live accounts. Conclusion Forex demo accounts are an excellent way to learn and practice trading in a risk-free environment. Whether you’re a beginner testing the waters or an advanced trader fine-tuning strategies, demo accounts provide valuable insights into the world of Forex. As you gain confidence, consider transitioning to a funded or managed Forex account to maximize your trading potential. Choose a reliable broker with robust features, and you’ll be well on your way to mastering Forex trading in 2024. 뉴스제목: Castle Island Founder Issues Bold $900K Bitcoin Forecast, Says BTC Will Match Gold Market Cap
본문: Nic Carter, the founder partner of Castle Island Ventures, has said Bitcoin could reach $900,000 in the long term, drawing comparisons to gold and citing factors such as growing institutional adoption. As Bitcoin sells at $103,967, analysts are revising their long-term valuation for BTC, proposing new heights. They cite factors such as adoption by institutional players, potential integration by sovereign entities , and its comparison to gold as a store of value.Experts have drawn parallels between Bitcoin's market capitalization and gold, citing the possibility of the crypto matching gold’s market cap. Castle Island Ventures’ Nic Carter highlighted this potential, projecting a long-term Bitcoin price of $900,000. Institutional Strategies For BitcoinCarter points out that institutional participation has significantly boosted Bitcoin’s prominence. Strategies like MicroStrategy’s use of fixed-income markets to fund Bitcoin purchases have shown the profitability of such investments, with substantial premiums on their holdings.As Carter notes, these trends demonstrate the growing interest in Bitcoin as an investment vehicle, especially among entities unable to buy the cryptocurrency directly.Additionally, regulatory changes in Washington could unlock new opportunities for broader adoption. Carter suggests that policies like the cessation of de-banking and Bitcoin custody by major banks could trigger a new wave of institutional and sovereign adoption.Proposals for Bitcoin as a Strategic ReserveFurthermore, Bitcoin's role in addressing fiscal challenges has also garnered attention. Earlier, VanEck proposed a model where the U.S. Treasury could strategically acquire Bitcoin to mitigate national debt. This proposal assumes the purchase of one million BTC tokens over five years at an average price of $250,000 per Bitcoin. Such strategic reserves could theoretically align with Senator Cynthia Lummis’ vision while addressing inflation and fiscal sustainability.These developments coincide with broader market trends, as noted by VanEck's CEO, Jan van Eck. His forecast of Bitcoin reaching $150,000–$170,000 by 2025 reflects growing confidence in the asset’s resilience.The asset's year-to-date return of 124.4% further underscores its market dominance in 2024, far outpacing gold’s 28.1% performance.

뉴스제목: A Comprehensive Guide to Online Forex Brokerage in 2024
본문: Forex Brokerage The Forex market, the largest financial market in the world, operates with daily trading volumes exceeding $6 trillion. This immense scale attracts millions of traders, making Forex trading one of the most sought-after investment opportunities. However, to participate, traders need reliable Forex brokerage services that provide access to trading platforms, market data, and execution tools. In this article, we’ll explore the fundamentals of online Forex brokerage, tips for choosing the best broker, and the top tools you need to succeed in Forex trading. What is an Online Forex Brokerage? An online Forex brokerage is a platform that acts as an intermediary between Forex traders and the global currency market. These brokers provide the necessary tools, platforms, and resources for executing trades on various currency pairs, commodities, indices, and cryptocurrencies. Why is Choosing the Right Forex Brokerage Important? Execution Speed: A good broker ensures that your trades are executed without delays, crucial in the volatile Forex market. Transparency: Reputable brokers provide clear information about spreads, commissions, and fees. Security: Licensed brokers protect your funds and ensure compliance with regulatory standards. Tools & Resources: Access to advanced trading platforms, analytics, and educational resources can enhance your trading success. Features of the Best Forex Brokerages 1. Regulatory Compliance Choose a Forex broker regulated by a reputable authority such as: USA: Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) and National Futures Association (NFA) UK: Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) Australia: Australian Securities and Investments Commission (ASIC) EU: Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission (CySEC) 2. Low Trading Costs Look for brokers offering tight spreads and low commissions. A good broker minimizes the cost of each trade, maximizing your profits. 3. User-Friendly Platforms Top brokers provide robust platforms like MetaTrader 4 (MT4), MetaTrader 5 (MT5), or their proprietary solutions with intuitive interfaces, charting tools, and real-time data. 4. Account Types The best brokers offer account options tailored to traders of all levels, including: Demo Accounts: For beginners to practice risk-free. Standard Accounts: Suitable for most traders with moderate fees. ECN Accounts: For advanced traders seeking direct market access. 5. Leverage and Margin Flexible leverage options allow traders to amplify their positions. Ensure the broker offers responsible leverage limits based on your region’s regulations. 6. Customer Support Round-the-clock support is essential for resolving issues quickly, especially in the 24/7 Forex market. Top Online Forex Brokerages in 2024 1. Forex.com Regulation: CFTC, NFA, FCA Features: User-friendly trading platforms. Competitive spreads and fast execution. Extensive educational resources. 2. IG Markets Regulation: FCA, ASIC Features: Over 80 currency pairs. Advanced charting tools. Award-winning customer support. 3. eToro Regulation: CySEC, ASIC, FCA Features: Social trading platform. Copy-trading options for beginners. $100,000 demo account. 4. Interactive Brokers Regulation: CFTC, NFA Features: Access to global markets. Low-cost trading. Advanced trading tools for professionals. 5. XM Regulation: CySEC, ASIC Features: Tight spreads starting from 0.0 pips. No hidden fees. Robust MT4 and MT5 support. Essential Tools for Forex Trading Brokerage Success Trading Platforms: MetaTrader 4 (MT4), MetaTrader 5 (MT5), and proprietary platforms with real-time analytics and custom indicators. Economic Calendar: Stay updated with global economic events that impact currency prices. Risk Management Tools: Tools for setting stop-loss, take-profit levels, and managing leverage. Market News Feeds: Real-time news and analysis from sources like Bloomberg and Reuters. Mobile Apps: On-the-go trading capabilities for convenience and quick decision-making. How to Choose the Best Forex Brokerage Research Regulation: Confirm the broker is licensed and compliant with local and international standards. Compare Costs: Evaluate spreads, commissions, and other fees. Test Platforms: Use demo accounts to assess the platform’s usability and features. Read Reviews: Check user reviews and expert opinions. Customer Support: Test response times and the quality of assistance. FAQs About Forex Brokerage 1. What is the difference between ECN and Standard accounts? ECN accounts provide direct access to the market with raw spreads, while Standard accounts have slightly wider spreads but no commissions. 2. Is Forex trading safe? Forex trading carries risk due to market volatility. Choosing a regulated broker and practicing proper risk management can help mitigate these risks. 3. Can I start Forex trading with $100? Yes, many brokers offer micro or mini accounts that allow you to trade with as little as $100. 4. What is the best platform for Forex trading? MetaTrader 4 (MT4) is a popular choice due to its user-friendly interface, customizable indicators, and widespread support. 5. Are there any hidden fees in Forex trading? Reputable brokers are transparent about fees. Check for hidden charges like overnight swap rates, inactivity fees, or deposit/withdrawal charges. Conclusion Choosing the right online Forex brokerage is the cornerstone of successful Forex trading. A good broker provides reliable platforms, competitive costs, and excellent support, enabling you to focus on strategy and execution. By considering factors like regulation, trading costs, and user experience, you can find the perfect Forex broker for your trading needs in 2024. 뉴스제목: ElevenLabs AI: Transforming Voice Cloning, Text-to-Speech, and Digital Content Creation
본문: ElevenLabs AI: Transforming Voice Cloning, Text-to-Speech, and Digital Content Creation In the fast-evolving landscape of artificial intelligence, ElevenLabs AI has emerged as a trailblazer in voice cloning and speech synthesis technology. Launched in 2022, the platform is reshaping how businesses, content creators, and individuals approach audio content and conversational AI. From advanced text-to-speech solutions to AI-powered dubbing, ElevenLabs AI is revolutionizing digital interaction while addressing real-world challenges. This article dives into the core features, applications, and ethical considerations surrounding ElevenLabs, offering a comprehensive overview of its significance in the tech ecosystem. What is ElevenLabs AI? ElevenLabs AI is an advanced artificial intelligence platform focused on generating lifelike synthetic voices and enhancing digital communication. Founded by Piotr Dąbkowski, a former Google machine learning engineer, and Mati Staniszewski, an ex-Palantir deployment strategist, ElevenLabs has gained global recognition for its innovative solutions. By leveraging cutting-edge AI models, the platform offers tools for: Speech Synthesis: Producing human-like speech with nuanced emotion and context. Voice Cloning: Creating replicas of voices from short audio samples. AI Dubbing: Translating audio content into multiple languages while retaining the original speaker’s voice and tone. Key Features of ElevenLabs AI 1. Speech Synthesis: Lifelike Voice Creation At its core, ElevenLabs AI offers a robust text-to-speech (TTS) engine capable of producing natural-sounding speech. Unlike traditional TTS systems, ElevenLabs focuses on context, ensuring that synthesized voices reflect the intended emotion and intonation. Multi-language Support: The platform supports 31 languages, making it a go-to choice for global users. Context Awareness: AI models interpret text nuances, adjusting tone and pace for a more engaging audio output. 2. Voice Cloning Technology One of ElevenLabs’ standout features is its voice cloning capability. This tool allows users to create synthetic replicas of voices using short audio clips. 뉴스제목: The Ultimate Guide to AI Presentation Makers
본문: The Ultimate Guide to AI Presentation Makers Creating compelling presentations can often feel like a daunting task. From structuring content to designing visuals, traditional methods require hours of effort. Enter AI presentation makers , tools that are revolutionizing the way we design slides and communicate ideas. These tools leverage artificial intelligence to automate slide creation, ensuring visually appealing and professional presentations in record time. In this guide, we’ll explore the best AI presentation tools , both free and premium, and how they cater to various needs like business pitches, educational content, and creative storytelling. What is an AI Presentation Maker? An AI presentation maker is a tool powered by artificial intelligence designed to create presentations automatically. It uses algorithms to: Analyze user-provided content. Suggest templates, layouts, and designs. Generate engaging slides with minimal manual input. Whether you’re crafting a PowerPoint presentation or an interactive online slideshow, AI tools help reduce the time and effort required while enhancing creativity and quality. Key Features of AI Presentation Makers 1. Content Generation AI presentation tools can generate slide content based on text prompts or uploaded documents. They summarize information, structure it logically, and display it in a presentation-ready format. 2. Design Automation Pre-designed templates and layouts are intelligently applied based on your input, ensuring your slides look professional without needing design skills. 3. Customization Options While automation speeds up the process, these tools also provide customization options for fonts, colors, and layouts to match your brand or personal style. 4. Collaboration and Sharing Most AI tools include cloud-based functionality, allowing teams to collaborate in real time and share presentations effortlessly. 5. Integration with Platforms Many tools seamlessly integrate with popular software like Microsoft PowerPoint, Google Slides, and Zoom. Benefits of Using an AI Presentation Maker Time-Saving: Reduce hours spent on manual slide creation. Professional Quality: Ensure polished and visually appealing designs. Ease of Use: No prior design experience is needed. Cost-Effective: Free and budget-friendly options available for individual and small business users. Top AI Presentation Makers 1. Gamma AI Presentation Gamma is a free AI-powered presentation tool that’s perfect for creating dynamic and interactive slides. Features: Generate presentations based on text prompts. Offers a library of themes and animations. Allows users to embed media like videos and images seamlessly. Best For: Interactive storytelling and creative presentations. 2. Beautiful.ai Known for its sleek designs and intuitive interface, Beautiful.ai simplifies the slide creation process for users of all experience levels. Features: Smart templates with AI-driven formatting. Drag-and-drop functionality for easy customization. Team collaboration tools for business presentations. Pricing: Free basic plan; premium plans start at $12/month. Best For: Business pitches and professional decks. 3. Canva Presentation Maker While Canva is a design powerhouse, its presentation maker, enhanced with AI tools, is a favorite among users. Features: AI suggestions for layouts and designs. Access to millions of free graphics, fonts, and images. Integration with PowerPoint for exporting. Pricing: Free basic plan; Canva Pro starts at $12.99/month. Best For: Marketing presentations and creative projects. 4. Tome AI Tome uses AI to craft storytelling-focused presentations. Its intuitive interface helps users generate visually rich slides effortlessly. Features: GPT-powered text generation. Seamless media integration. Real-time collaboration features. Best For: Educational content and storytelling presentations. 5. Visme Visme combines AI functionality with robust customization options, making it an excellent choice for detailed and data-driven presentations. Features: AI-powered chart and graph generation. Branded templates for consistency. Interactive elements for engaging slides. Pricing: Free basic plan; paid plans start at $15/month. Best For: Data presentations and reports. Free AI Presentation Makers If you’re on a budget, there are several free tools that still offer exceptional features: Gamma: Perfect for interactive and creative projects. Canva Free: Ideal for simple, stylish presentations. Prezi: Offers dynamic, zoomable presentations. Zoho Show: A cloud-based tool with essential AI features. How to Choose the Best AI Presentation Maker When selecting an AI presentation maker, consider the following factors: Purpose: Are you creating business presentations, educational slides, or creative content? Budget: Determine if free tools meet your needs or if premium features justify the cost. Ease of Use: Choose a platform that aligns with your technical proficiency. Customization: Ensure the tool provides enough flexibility for branding and personalization. Step-by-Step Guide to Create a Presentation with AI Choose Your Tool: Select an AI presentation maker that fits your requirements. Input Your Content: Provide text prompts, upload documents, or enter data. Select a Template: Pick from pre-designed templates or let the AI recommend one. Customize: Adjust colors, fonts, and layouts to align with your vision. Add Media: Embed images, videos, or graphs to enhance your slides. Preview and Share: Review the final presentation and share it with your audience. The Future of AI in Presentations As AI technology evolves, we can expect presentation tools to become even more intelligent and intuitive. Upcoming innovations may include: Voice Integration: Narrate slides directly through AI-generated voices. AR/VR Compatibility: Create immersive, interactive presentations. Advanced Analytics: Receive audience engagement insights to improve presentations. Conclusion AI presentation makers are transforming the way we create and deliver content. Whether you’re a student, entrepreneur, or corporate professional, these tools offer unmatched efficiency, creativity, and professionalism. From Gamma AI to Beautiful.ai , the options are vast and cater to diverse needs. Adopting AI-powered tools not only saves time but also ensures you stand out with visually compelling and impactful presentations. Explore these platforms today and elevate your content creation game. 뉴스제목: $1 Million Bitcoin? Trump’s Reserve Plan Sparks Global Crypto Frenzy
본문: The post $1 Million Bitcoin? Trump’s Reserve Plan Sparks Global Crypto Frenzy appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The Bitcoin market has recently hit a major milestone, surpassing $100,000. This achievement has sparked a renewed wave of discussions about Bitcoin’s potential future. But here’s the twist—crypto enthusiast Atlas, known on X, believes that with the upcoming launch of a US Bitcoin Reserve under President Donald Trump in 2025, Bitcoin’s price could soar to an eye-popping $1 million per coin. Yes, you read that right—$1 million per Bitcoin! Could this bold prediction become reality? Let’s dive deeper into Atlas’ reasoning and explore what could make this massive price surge possible. Cryptocurrency in the US Political Campaign Cryptocurrency has become a key topic in the US political campaign, with both Donald Trump and Kamala Harris offering bold proposals for the industry. Trump’s plan to create a US Bitcoin Reserve has gained significant attention, positioning it as a way to protect the US economy from inflation. Atlas believes that under Trump, the US government could acquire at least 20% of Bitcoin’s total supply. ➠ 2 ◈ Trump’s election campaign popularized the notion of a $BTC reserve, pitching it as a future-focused economic solution ◈ Critics were quick to condemn the plan, citing Bitcoin’s volatility as a major issue ◈ Many argued it would create more problems than benefits for… — Atlas (@crptAtlas) December 17, 2024 Bitcoin Reserve: Benefits and Criticism Despite the excitement, the Bitcoin reserve proposal has faced sharp criticism. Opponents argue that Bitcoin’s volatility makes it too risky to be used as a national reserve, and warn it could harm the US economy. However, supporters of the plan argue that Bitcoin can act as a hedge against economic uncertainty. Over the past year, Bitcoin has risen by 152.7%, strengthening its role as a safe asset in times of financial instability. A Global Shift Toward Bitcoin On the global stage, countries like Russia are looking at Bitcoin as a way to navigate economic sanctions. Atlas points out that over $300 billion of Russian assets were frozen by Western powers due to sanctions. Other nations, like China, frustrated by the US’s global economic dominance through the dollar, are also likely to adopt Bitcoin as an alternative. Atlas suggests these countries are eager to reduce their reliance on the US dollar and would welcome strategies like Bitcoin to help achieve this. The US Must Act Quickly to Stay Ahead For the US, now is the time to act. Atlas argues that acquiring a significant portion of Bitcoin’s supply would help secure the country’s position as a leader in the global Bitcoin market. By purchasing 20% of the total Bitcoin supply, the US could strengthen its financial system and dominate the cryptocurrency space. $1 Million Bitcoin: The Economics Behind the Prediction Atlas’ forecast of Bitcoin reaching $1 million per coin is based on basic economic principles: lower supply and higher demand lead to price increases. If the US adopts Bitcoin on a large scale, the demand would rise significantly, pushing the price higher. The US Bitcoin Reserve could change the global financial system. With increased demand, limited supply, and growing competition from other countries, Bitcoin’s future looks promising. While the $1 million Bitcoin target may seem bold, Atlas’ reasoning makes it seem more possible than ever.

Content Creators Draft blog introductions, outlines, or complete articles effortlessly. 4. Email Marketers Write compelling email campaigns that improve open and click-through rates. Tips for Maximizing Copy AI’s Potential Be Clear with Input: The more specific your input, the better the output quality. 뉴스제목: Metaplanet Anticipates First Operating Profit in Seven Years Following Bitcoin Addition to Balance Sheet
본문: Japanese investment firm Metaplanet is poised to achieve its first consolidated operating profit in seven years, just months after incorporating Bitcoin into its balance sheet . The Tokyo-based firm announced on December 18 that it expects to generate 890 million Japanese yen ($5.8 million) in revenue for the fiscal year ending December 31, a significant increase from the 261 million yen recorded in the previous fiscal year. The company’s operating profit is projected to reach 270 million yen, a sharp turnaround from the 468 million yen loss it suffered last year. Large Portion of Metaplanet’s Revenue Comes From Bitcoin Products A substantial portion of Metaplanet’s revenue comes from its Bitcoin-related activities, particularly its strategy of selling Bitcoin put options. This approach generated 520 million yen in income, making it a key driver of the company’s improved financial outlook. Put options allow investors to sell an asset at a pre-agreed strike price, and Metaplanet earns a premium for each contract sold, regardless of whether the option is exercised. If exercised, the company can acquire Bitcoin at the agreed price, aligning with its broader strategy of accumulating the cryptocurrency. The firm’s decision to adopt Bitcoin as a treasury asset began in April, part of a shift aimed at hedging against currency depreciation. Beyond its Bitcoin-related activities, Metaplanet’s hotel business has also played a role in its improved financial performance. Through its subsidiary, Wen Tokyo Co., the company operates the Royal Oak Hotel in Tokyo’s Gotanda district. The combined success of its hotel operations and Bitcoin strategy has put the company on track to achieve profitability for the first time since 2017. *Metaplanet Projects First Fiscal Year Operating Profit Since 2017* pic.twitter.com/oYNKOtNatR — Metaplanet Inc. (@Metaplanet_JP) December 18, 2024 Looking ahead, Metaplanet plans to formalize its Bitcoin accumulation efforts as a standalone business line. According to its December 18 disclosure, the firm will pursue “Bitcoin accumulation and management” as a distinct unit. The strategy includes leveraging loans, equity, convertible bonds, and other financial instruments to acquire and hold Bitcoin. The company also intends to maintain its reliance on Bitcoin put option sales as a significant revenue source. Metaplanet to Create More Revenue Streams from Bitcoin Activities Metaplanet’s ambitions extend beyond treasury management. It aims to create revenue streams from Bitcoin-related marketing activities. To support this initiative, the company recently secured a license to operate a Japanese version of the crypto-focused news outlet, Bitcoin Magazine. The firm’s growing commitment to Bitcoin has made it Asia’s second-largest corporate Bitcoin holder, trailing only Boyaa Interactive. As of its latest update, Metaplanet holds 1,142 Bitcoin, valued at approximately $119.4 million. To support its Bitcoin accumulation strategy, Metaplanet issued its fourth bond offering on December 16, raising nearly 4.5 billion yen ($30 million). The company also announced plans for a 5 billion yen private placement of ordinary bonds. Aside from Metaplanet, other major corporate Bitcoin holders like MicroStrategy have been continuously expanding their Bitcoin holdings. Earlier this week, MicroStrategy acquired 15,350 Bitcoin , valued at approximately $1.6 billion, bringing the company’s total Bitcoin holdings to 439,000 Bitcoin (currently over $46 billion). The post Metaplanet Anticipates First Operating Profit in Seven Years Following Bitcoin Addition to Balance Sheet appeared first on Cryptonews .

뉴스제목: Undetectable AI: The Future of Human-Like Content Creation
본문: Undetectable AI: The Future of Human-Like Content Creation Artificial intelligence (AI) has transformed content creation, enabling tools to generate text that rivals human writers. However, as AI-generated content becomes more prevalent, detecting such content has also evolved. This is where undetectable AI steps in—producing text indistinguishable from human writing and bypassing AI detection tools. Whether you’re a marketer, blogger, or student, undetectable AI can help you create high-quality, natural-sounding text while avoiding detection. Here’s everything you need to know about this cutting-edge technology and how it can benefit your projects. What is Undetectable AI? Undetectable AI refers to artificial intelligence tools designed to generate content that closely mimics human writing patterns, making it difficult for detection software to identify it as machine-generated. Unlike traditional AI tools, undetectable AI focuses on: Contextual accuracy: Ensuring the text aligns perfectly with the given topic. Natural flow: Mimicking human-like sentence structures and linguistic styles. Detection avoidance: Utilizing advanced algorithms to evade AI detection systems like GPT detectors. Key Features of Undetectable AI 1. Human-Like Text Generation Undetectable AI tools analyze vast datasets of human-written content to produce natural and authentic text. 2. Detection Evasion The technology employs techniques to bypass AI-detection algorithms, ensuring your content appears human-created. 3. Customizable Output Users can adjust tone, style, and complexity to match their specific needs, from casual blogs to formal academic papers. 4. SEO Optimization Many undetectable AI tools include SEO features, helping you rank better on search engines while maintaining a natural tone. 5. Multi-Language Support These tools often support multiple languages, catering to a global audience. Benefits of Using Undetectable AI 1. Efficiency Undetectable AI reduces the time spent on content creation, allowing you to focus on other tasks. 2. Quality Output Generate error-free, polished text that reads like it was written by a professional. 3. Cost-Effective Hiring writers for bulk content can be expensive. Undetectable AI offers an affordable alternative without compromising quality. 4. Versatility From blogs and emails to essays and ad copies, undetectable AI adapts to various writing needs. 5. Compliance Assurance By avoiding detection, undetectable AI ensures that your content adheres to requirements where originality is critical. How Does Undetectable AI Work? 1. Data Analysis The tool analyzes vast amounts of human-written text to understand linguistic patterns and styles. 2. Advanced Algorithms It uses deep learning algorithms to craft sentences that appear natural and organic. 3. Fine-Tuning Users can provide input or prompts to guide the AI in generating content tailored to their specific requirements. 4. Post-Processing Many tools include features for paraphrasing, rewording, and polishing content to further enhance its human-like quality. Best Tools for Undetectable AI Here are some leading undetectable AI tools available today: 1. StealthWriter AI A tool specifically designed to create undetectable AI-generated text with high customization options. 2. OpenAI GPT Models With advanced customization, GPT models can produce content that mimics human writing effectively. 3. QuillBot Known for its paraphrasing capabilities, QuillBot helps refine AI-generated text to avoid detection. 4. Content at Scale Specializes in creating long-form, undetectable AI content optimized for SEO and reader engagement. Applications of Undetectable AI 1. Content Marketing Generate blog posts, social media captions, and ad copy that resonates with your audience while remaining undetectable. 2. Academic Writing Create essays, research summaries, and assignments that pass detection software used in educational institutions. 3. SEO Optimization Produce keyword-rich content that ranks well on search engines without appearing AI-generated. 4. Personal Use Draft emails, letters, or creative writing pieces with a human touch. 5. Business Communication Prepare professional reports, proposals, and presentations efficiently. How to Optimize Undetectable AI for Best Results Provide Clear Prompts: The more specific your input, the better the output. Use Editing Tools: Post-process the AI-generated text for additional polishing. Blend Styles: Combine AI-generated content with your edits to ensure uniqueness. Focus on Context: Ensure the output aligns with your target audience and purpose. Avoid Overuse: Use undetectable AI as a supplement, not a replacement, for human creativity. Challenges of Undetectable AI While undetectable AI offers numerous benefits, it also poses challenges: Ethical Concerns: Misuse for plagiarism or deceptive purposes can harm credibility. Initial Costs: Advanced tools may require premium subscriptions. Learning Curve: Users need to invest time to maximize the tool’s potential. Is Undetectable AI Ethical? Using undetectable AI ethically depends on intent. For legitimate purposes like content marketing, brainstorming, or SEO optimization, it’s a valuable tool. However, unethical uses like plagiarism or misrepresentation should be avoided to maintain integrity. Why Undetectable AI Matters As AI detection tools become more sophisticated, undetectable AI ensures content creators stay ahead. It bridges the gap between automation and human touch, providing businesses and individuals with a competitive edge in content creation. Conclusion Undetectable AI is revolutionizing the way we create and share content. By offering human-like text that bypasses detection tools, it empowers marketers, students, and professionals to achieve their goals efficiently and effectively. Investing in the right undetectable AI tool can transform your workflow and help you produce high-quality content that truly stands out. Embrace the future of content creation with undetectable AI today! 본문: The post Binance Removes WRX, AKRO, and BLZ: Token Prices Face 40% Crash! appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Binance, the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange with over 250 million users, has made a surprising move— delisting three popular digital assets : WazirX (WRX), Kaon (AKRO), and Bluzelle (BLZ). This decision, part of Binance’s regular review process, has caused these tokens to take a significant hit, with prices plummeting by 20% to 40%. Keep reading to find out the details behind Binance’s latest move and its impact on the affected tokens. Why Were These Tokens Delisted? Binance regularly reviews its listed tokens based on factors like development activity, trading volume, network stability, and regulatory compliance. After careful evaluation, the exchange decided that WRX, AKRO, and BLZ didn’t meet these standards. This action emphasizes Binance’s commitment to protecting users and maintaining a healthy crypto ecosystem. Key Dates for Affected Users Here are the key dates users need to know: Trading Pairs Removal : Trading for WRX/USDT, AKRO/USDT, BLZ/BTC, and BLZ/USDT will be delisted on December 25, 2024, at 03:00 (UTC) . Deposits and Withdrawals : Deposits for these tokens will no longer be credited after December 26, 2024, at 03:00 (UTC) . Withdrawals will remain available until February 25, 2025, at 03:00 (UTC) . Futures Trading : Binance will settle and close all BLZUSDT futures contracts by December 23, 2024 . Other Services : Services like Binance Margin, Auto-Invest, and Gift Cards will gradually phase out support for these tokens in the coming weeks. Beware of Price Drops Following Binance’s announcement to delist these tokens, their prices experienced a sharp decline. India’s leading crypto exchange token, WazirX (WRX) , dropped by 40% in just a few hours, now trading around $0.15. Similarly, Kaon (formerly Akropolis), represented by AKRO, also faced a steep fall, plunging by 25% followed by the BLZ token recording a drop of 24% now trading around $0.10. What Should Binance Users Do? Binance has advised users to close any open positions and manage their holdings before the deadlines to avoid issues. As Binance continues to uphold strict listing standards, it is crucial for tokens to meet these criteria to stay listed on the exchange. As the dust settles on these delistings, traders and investors alike will be watching closely to see how the market responds.
